about_the_game:
ENTER THE RIFT. ESCAPE THE UNREAL.

You are an operative of Somnium Corp, tasked with sealing dimensional rifts that threaten to consume reality. But each mission into these corrupted spaces known as branches brings unpredictable horrors.

🌌 EXPLORE, SURVIVE, ESCAPE

  • Traverse eerie, handcrafted levels inspired by liminal spaces, abandoned offices, and impossible landscapes.

  • Work alone or in a team co-op multiplayer supports up to 8 players.

  • Search for valuable resources, unravel cryptic messages, and confront the entities lurking beyond reality.

⚠️ CONTRACT-BASED MISSIONS

Every contract is a dangerous assignment more than just sealing the rift, you may need to:
✔ Restore power to failing systems.
✔ Extract lost data from abandoned terminals.
✔ Contain unstable anomalies before they spread.

✔ Survive until the extraction timer runs out.

🏠 CUSTOMIZABLE HUB & GEAR PROGRESSION

  • Upgrade your EchoStation your personal safe haven between missions.

  • Trade with Solace, the enigmatic Somnium Corp AI, to purchase better contracts, gear, and enhancements.

  • Bring tools into the field but if you die, you lose everything inside the teleporter.

🌀 IMMERSIVE HORROR SYSTEMS

  • Adaptive AI that learns and reacts to player actions.

  • Psychological horror elements hallucinations, shifting environments, and unreliable senses.

  • Limited resources force tough choices will you carry extra batteries or an extra weapon?

🕳️ WILL YOU MAKE IT BACK ALIVE?

The rift is calling. The branch is collapsing. Time is running out.
Do you have what it takes to complete your mission, or will you be lost beyond the threshold?

name: Unreality: Beyond Worlds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or Intel Core i5-9600K
  • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 or AMD RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X or Intel Core i5-12400
  • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 or AMD RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Close the rifts, survive the horrors beyond reality, and escape before the branch collapses. Unreality: Beyond Worlds is a multiplayer co-op survival horror where every contract is a fight against the unknown.
